name: Sapply N' Roli
description:
Sapply is a seed struggling to grow and plant his roots.  You, Roli, will help him break the surface by getting him what he needs.  But watch out, evil pests are out to hurt you, and steal your items for Sapply!

TEAM SAPLINGS N' SPROUTS

  • Elly Garcia - Producer, Narrative – Website
  • Galen Molk – Unity Programmer – LinkedIn
  • Genaro Vallejo – 2D Artist, Game Design – LinkedIn
  • Peter Williams – Audio Engineer – itch.io

Special Thanks to hosts Decoy Games and Coexist GameHouse!
